workflow:
apiVersion: argoproj.io/v1alpha1
kind: Workflow
metadata:
  generateName: add-song-to-playlist-
spec:
  entrypoint: add-song-to-playlist
  templates:
  - name: add-song-to-playlist
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: user_ID
      - name: playlist_ID
      - name: song_name
    dag:
      tasks:
      - name: add-song
        template: add-song-to-playlist-task
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: user_ID
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.user_ID }}}}'
          - name: playlist_ID
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.playlist_ID }}}}'
          - name: song_name
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.song_name }}}}'

  - name: add-song-to-playlist-task
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: user_ID
      - name: playlist_ID
      - name: song_name
    container:
      image: python:3.8
      command: [python]
      args: ['-c', "import requests; print(requests.post('http://api.example.com/addsong', json={'user_ID': '{{{{ inputs.parameters.user_ID }}}}', 'playlist_ID': '{{{{ inputs.parameters.playlist_ID }}}}', 'song_name': '{{{{ inputs.parameters.song_name }}}}'}).json())"]

apiVersion: argoproj.io/v1alpha1
kind: Workflow
metadata:
  generateName: reserve-book-
spec:
  entrypoint: reserve-book
  templates:
  - name: reserve-book
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: user_email
      - name: ISBN
      - name: start_date
      - name: end_date
    dag:
      tasks:
      - name: reserve-book-task
        template: reserve-book-template
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: user_email
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.user_email }}}}'
          - name: ISBN
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.ISBN }}}}'
          - name: start_date
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.start_date }}}}'
          - name: end_date
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.end_date }}}}'

  - name: reserve-book-template
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: user_email
      - name: ISBN
      - name: start_date
      - name: end_date
    container:
      image: python:3.8
      command: [python]
      args: ['-c', "import requests; response = requests.post('http://example.com/reserve', json={'user_email': '{{{{ inputs.parameters.user_email }}}}', 'ISBN': '{{{{ inputs.parameters.ISBN }}}}', 'start_date': '{{{{ inputs.parameters.start_date }}}}', 'end_date': '{{{{ inputs.parameters.end_date }}}}'}); print(response.json())"]

apiVersion: argoproj.io/v1alpha1
kind: Workflow
metadata:
  generateName: reserve-book-
spec:
  entrypoint: reserve-book
  templates:
  - name: reserve-book
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: user_email
      - name: ISBN
      - name: start_date
      - name: end_date
    dag:
      tasks:
      - name: reserve-book
        template: reserve-book-task
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: user_email
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.user_email }}}}'
          - name: ISBN
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.ISBN }}}}'
          - name: start_date
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.start_date }}}}'
          - name: end_date
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.end_date }}}}'

  - name: reserve-book-task
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: user_email
      - name: ISBN
      - name: start_date
      - name: end_date
    container:
      image: python:3.8
      command: ["python", "-c"]
      args: 
      - |
        import requests
        
        user_email = '{{{{ inputs.parameters.user_email }}}}'
        ISBN = '{{{{ inputs.parameters.ISBN }}}}'
        start_date = '{{{{ inputs.parameters.start_date }}}}'
        end_date = '{{{{ inputs.parameters.end_date }}}}'
        
        # Assuming the ReserveBook API endpoint is available
        url = "http://api.example.com/reservebook"
        payload = {
            "user_email": user_email,
            "ISBN": ISBN,
            "start_date": start_date,
            "end_date": end_date
        }
        response = requests.post(url, json=payload)
        print(response.json())
    
  arguments:
    parameters:
    - name: user_email
      value: "michael_brown"
    - name: ISBN
      value: "978-3-16-148410-0"  # Assuming this is the ISBN for 'Pride and Prejudice'
    - name: start_date
      value: "2023-08-07"
    - name: end_date
      value: "2023-08-21"

apiVersion: argoproj.io/v1alpha1
kind: Workflow
metadata:
  generateName: book-hotel-
spec:
  entrypoint: main
  templates:
  - name: main
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: city
      - name: date
    dag:
      tasks:
      - name: recommend-hotel
        template: recommend-hotel
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: city
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.city }}}}'
          - name: star_level
            value: '3'
      - name: book-hotel
        template: book-hotel
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: hotel_name
            value: '{{{{ tasks.recommend-hotel.result }}}}'
          - name: date
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.date }}}}'
  - name: recommend-hotel
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: city
      - name: star_level
    http:
      url: <recommend-hotel-api-url>
      method: GET
      parameters:
      - name: city
        value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.city }}}}'
      - name: star_level
        value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.star_level }}}}'
  - name: book-hotel
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: hotel_name
      - name: date
    http:
      url: <book-hotel-api-url>
      method: POST
      parameters:
      - name: hotel_name
        value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.hotel_name }}}}'
      - name: date
        value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.date }}}}'

      parameters:

    dag:

        arguments:
          parameters:

        template: check-vacancy
        arguments:

            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.date }}}}'
      - name: book-hotel

          parameters:
          - name: hotel_name
            value: '{{{{ tasks.recommend-hotel.outputs.result }}}}'

  - name: recommend-hotel

apiVersion: argoproj.io/v1alpha1
kind: Workflow
metadata:
  generateName: concert-departure-alert-
spec:
  entrypoint: main
  templates:
  - name: main
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: venue
        value: Central Park
      - name: traffic
        value: moderate
      - name: modeOfTransport
        value: car
    dag:
      tasks:
      - name: get-concerts
        template: get-concerts
      - name: calculate-travel-time
        template: calculate-travel-time
        dependencies: [get-concerts]
      - name: alert-before-departure
        template: alert-before-departure
        dependencies: [calculate-travel-time]

  - name: get-concerts
    http:
      url: "http://example.com/api/musicconcert"
      method: GET
      parameters:
      - name: venue
        value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.venue }}}}'

  - name: calculate-travel-time
    http:
      url: "http://example.com/api/timecalculator"
      method: GET
      parameters:
      - name: traffic
        value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.traffic }}}}'
      - name: modeOfTransport
        value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.modeOfTransport }}}}'

  - name: alert-before-departure
    http:
      url: "http://example.com/api/alertbeforedeparture"
      method: GET
      parameters:
      - name: event_time
        value: '{{{{ tasks.get-concerts.result }}}}'
      - name: travel_time
        value: '{{{{ tasks.calculate-travel-time.result }}}}'

apiVersion: argoproj.io/v1alpha1
kind: Workflow
metadata:
  generateName: meeting-scheduler-
spec:
  entrypoint: main
  templates:
  - name: main
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: user_name
        description: "The name of the user"
      - name: destination
        description: "The destination of the meeting"
    dag:
      tasks:
      - name: get-next-meeting
        template: get-next-meeting
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: user_name
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.user_name }}}}'
      - name: find-taxi
        template: find-taxi
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: ArrivalTime
            value: '{{{{ tasks.get-next-meeting.result }}}}'
      - name: calculate-fare
        template: calculate-fare
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: TaxiInfo
            value: '{{{{ tasks.find-taxi.result }}}}'
          - name: destination
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.destination }}}}'
      - name: alert-before-departure
        template: alert-before-departure
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: event_time
            value: '{{{{ tasks.get-next-meeting.result }}}}'
          - name: travel_time
            value: '{{{{ tasks.calculate-fare.result }}}}'

  - name: get-next-meeting
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: user_name
    container:
      image: my-api-image
      command: ["sh", "-c"]
      args: ["curl -X GET 'http://api.example.com/getUserNextMeeting?user_name={{inputs.parameters.user_name}}'"]

  - name: find-taxi
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: ArrivalTime
    container:
      image: my-api-image
      command: ["sh", "-c"]
      args: ["curl -X GET 'http://api.example.com/findTaxi?ArrivalTime={{inputs.parameters.ArrivalTime}}'"]

  - name: calculate-fare
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: TaxiInfo
      - name: destination
    container:
      image: my-api-image
      command: ["sh", "-c"]
      args: ["curl -X GET 'http://api.example.com/calculateFare?TaxiInfo={{inputs.parameters.TaxiInfo}}&destination={{inputs.parameters.destination}}'"]

  - name: alert-before-departure
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: event_time
      - name: travel_time
    container:
      image: my-api-image
      command: ["sh", "-c"]
      args: ["curl -X GET 'http://api.example.com/alertBeforeDeparture?event_time={{inputs.parameters.event_time}}&travel_time={{inputs.parameters.travel_time}}'"]

apiVersion: argoproj.io/v1alpha1
kind: Workflow
metadata:
  generateName: music-festival-departure-
spec:
  entrypoint: main
  templates:
  - name: main
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: event_time
        description: "The time of the music festival event"
      - name: traffic
        description: "The estimated traffic condition"
    dag:
      tasks:
      - name: calculate-travel-time
        template: time-calculator
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: traffic
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.traffic }}}}'
          - name: modeOfTransport
            value: 'bike'
      - name: alert-before-departure
        template: alert-before-departure
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: event_time
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.event_time }}}}'
          - name: travel_time
            value: '{{{{ tasks.calculate-travel-time.result }}}}'

  - name: time-calculator
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: traffic
      - name: modeOfTransport
    http:
      url: <TimeCalculator API URL>
      method: POST
      body:
        traffic: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.traffic }}}}'
        modeOfTransport: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.modeOfTransport }}}}'

  - name: alert-before-departure
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: event_time
      - name: travel_time
    http:
      url: <AlertBeforeDeparture API URL>
      method: POST
      body:
        event_time: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.event_time }}}}'
        travel_time: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.travel_time }}}}'

kind: Workflow
metadata:
  generateName: flight-booking-
spec:
  entrypoint: flight-booking
  templates:
  - name: flight-booking
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: origin
      - name: destination
    dag:
      tasks:
      - name: search-flight
        template: search-flight
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: from_location
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.origin }}}}'
          - name: to_location
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.destination }}}}'
          - name: date
            value: '2023-12-25'
      - name: book-flight
        template: book-flight
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: flight_details
            value: '{{{{ tasks.search-flight.result }}}}'
          - name: preferred_flight_class
            value: 'Economy'
  - name: search-flight
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: from_location
      - name: to_location
      - name: date
    http:
      url: <search-flight-api-url>
      method: GET
      headers: []
      queryParams:
      - name: from_location
        value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.from_location }}}}'
      - name: to_location
        value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.to_location }}}}'
      - name: date
        value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.date }}}}'
  - name: book-flight
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: flight_details
      - name: preferred_flight_class
    http:
      url: <book-flight-api-url>
      method: POST
      headers: []
      body:
        flight_details: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.flight_details }}}}'
        preferred_flight_class: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.preferred_flight_class }}}}'

apiVersion: argoproj.io/v1alpha1
kind: Workflow

apiVersion: argoproj.io/v1alpha1
kind: Workflow
metadata:
  generateName: mexican-food-recommendation-
spec:
  entrypoint: main
  templates:
  - name: main
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: city
        description: The city where Mike is located
      - name: user_location
        description: Mike's current location
    dag:
      tasks:
      - name: get-restaurant
        template: get-restaurant
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: city
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.city }}}}'
          - name: cuisine
            value: 'Mexican'
      - name: restaurant-location
        template: restaurant-location
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: city
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.city }}}}'
      - name: find-nearby-restaurant
        template: find-nearby-restaurant
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: user_location
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.user_location }}}}'
      - name: recommend-items
        template: recommend-items
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: restaurant_name
            value: '{{{{ tasks.get-restaurant.outputs.result }}}}'
  - name: get-restaurant
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: city
      - name: cuisine
    http:
      url: http://api.example.com/getRestaurant
      method: GET
      headers:
        Content-Type: application/json
      queryParams:
        city: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.city }}}}'
        cuisine: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.cuisine }}}}'
  - name: restaurant-location
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: city
    http:
      url: http://api.example.com/restaurantLocation
      method: GET
      headers:
        Content-Type: application/json
      queryParams:
        city: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.city }}}}'
  - name: find-nearby-restaurant
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: user_location
    http:
      url: http://api.example.com/findNearbyRestaurant
      method: GET
      headers:
        Content-Type: application/json
      queryParams:
        user_location: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.user_location }}}}'
  - name: recommend-items
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: restaurant_name
    http:
      url: http://api.example.com/recommendItems
      method: GET
      headers:
        Content-Type: application/json
      queryParams:
        restaurant_name: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.restaurant_name }}}}'

        arguments:
          parameters:

          - name: number_of_tickets

  - name: get-favorite-genre

      parameters:
      - name: user_ID

      parameters:

  - name: recommend-movie

      parameters:
      - name: genre

      method: GET
      parameters:
      - name: genre

  - name: book-movie-ticket

      parameters:
      - name: movie_name
      - name: showtime
      - name: number_of_tickets

      - name: showtime

      - name: number_of_tickets

apiVersion: argoproj.io/v1alpha1
kind: Workflow
metadata:
  generateName: check-affordability-
spec:
  entrypoint: main
  templates:
  - name: main
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: card_id
      - name: product_id
    dag:
      tasks:
      - name: get-card-number
        template: card2number
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: card_id
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.card_id }}}}'
      - name: get-product-cost
        template: productid2cost
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: product_id
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.product_id }}}}'
      - name: check-card-balance
        template: checkcardbalance
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: card_number
            value: '{{{{ tasks.get-card-number.result }}}}'
      - name: check-enough-balance
        template: enoughbalance
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: product_price
            value: '{{{{ tasks.get-product-cost.result }}}}'
          - name: card_balance
            value: '{{{{ tasks.check-card-balance.result }}}}'
  - name: card2number
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: card_id
    container:
      image: myapi/card2number
      command: ["sh", "-c"]
      args: ["echo '{{{{ inputs.parameters.card_id }}}}'"]
  - name: productid2cost
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: product_id
    container:
      image: myapi/productid2cost
      command: ["sh", "-c"]
      args: ["echo '{{{{ inputs.parameters.product_id }}}}'"]
  - name: checkcardbalance
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: card_number
    container:
      image: myapi/checkcardbalance
      command: ["sh", "-c"]
      args: ["echo '{{{{ inputs.parameters.card_number }}}}'"]
  - name: enoughbalance
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: product_price
      - name: card_balance
    container:
      image: myapi/enoughbalance
      command: ["sh", "-c"]
      args: ["echo '{{{{ inputs.parameters.product_price }}}} {{ inputs.parameters.card_balance }}'"]

apiVersion: argoproj.io/v1alpha1
kind: Workflow
metadata:
  generateName: add-product-to-cart-
spec:
  entrypoint: add-product-to-cart
  templates:
  - name: add-product-to-cart
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: product_ID
      - name: customer_ID
      - name: quantity
    dag:
      tasks:
      - name: add-product-to-cart
        template: add-product-to-cart-task
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: product_ID
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.product_ID }}}}'
          - name: customer_ID
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.customer_ID }}}}'
          - name: quantity
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.quantity }}}}'

  - name: add-product-to-cart-task
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: product_ID
      - name: customer_ID
      - name: quantity
    container:
      image: python:3.8
      command: [python]
      args: ['-c', """
import requests

product_ID = '{{{{ inputs.parameters.product_ID }}}}'
customer_ID = '{{{{ inputs.parameters.customer_ID }}}}'
quantity = '{{{{ inputs.parameters.quantity }}}}'

# Assuming the API endpoint and method are known
url = 'http://api.example.com/addProductToCart'
response = requests.post(url, json={
    'product_ID': product_ID,
    'customer_ID': customer_ID,
    'quantity': quantity
})

print(response.json())
"""]

apiVersion: argoproj.io/v1alpha1
kind: Workflow
metadata:
  generateName: enroll-course-
spec:
  entrypoint: main
  templates:
  - name: main
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: student_name
      - name: course_name
      - name: instructor_name
      - name: semester
    dag:
      tasks:
      - name: get-student-id
        template: student-id
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: student_name
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.student_name }}}}'
      - name: get-course-id
        template: course-id
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: course_name
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.course_name }}}}'
      - name: get-instructor-id
        template: instructor-id
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: instructor_name
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.instructor_name }}}}'
      - name: enroll-course
        template: enroll
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: person_ID
            value: '{{{{ tasks.get-student-id.outputs.result }}}}'
          - name: subject_ID
            value: '{{{{ tasks.get-course-id.outputs.result }}}}'
          - name: semester
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.semester }}}}'
  - name: student-id
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: student_name
    http:
      url: http://example.com/api/studentname2id
      method: GET
      headers:
        Content-Type: application/json
      body: '{"student_name": "{{{{ inputs.parameters.student_name }}}}"}'
  - name: course-id
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: course_name
    http:

apiVersion: argoproj.io/v1alpha1
kind: Workflow
metadata:

spec:
  entrypoint: main
  templates:

        value: 'Miami'

        value: 'townhouse'
      - name: downPayment
        value: 150000
      - name: interestRate
        value: 3
      - name: term
        value: 25
    dag:
      tasks:
      - name: get-property-price
        template: get-property-price
      - name: estimate-tax
        template: estimate-tax
        dependencies: [get-property-price]
      - name: calculate-mortgage-payment
        template: calculate-mortgage-payment
        dependencies: [get-property-price]
      - name: calculate-ownership-cost
        template: calculate-ownership-cost
        dependencies: [calculate-mortgage-payment, estimate-tax]

  - name: get-property-price
    http:
      url: "http://example.com/RealEstatePrice"
      method: "GET"
      parameters:
      - name: city
        value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.city }}}}'
      - name: propertyType
        value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.propertyType }}}}'

  - name: estimate-tax
    http:
      url: "http://example.com/TaxEstimator"
      method: "GET"
      parameters:
      - name: propertyPrice
        value: '{{{{ tasks.get-property-price.result }}}}'
      - name: city
        value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.city }}}}'

  - name: calculate-mortgage-payment
    http:
      url: "http://example.com/MortgageCalculator"
      method: "GET"
      parameters:
      - name: propertyPrice
        value: '{{{{ tasks.get-property-price.result }}}}'
      - name: downPayment
        value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.downPayment }}}}'
      - name: interestRate
        value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.interestRate }}}}'
      - name: term
        value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.term }}}}'

  - name: calculate-ownership-cost
    http:
      url: "http://example.com/PropertyOwnershipCost"
      method: "GET"
      parameters:
      - name: mortgagePayment
        value: '{{{{ tasks.calculate-mortgage-payment.result }}}}'
      - name: tax
        value: '{{{{ tasks.estimate-tax.result }}}}'

apiVersion: argoproj.io/v1alpha1

spec:
  entrypoint: main
  templates:

      - name: propertyType
      - name: city
      - name: downPayment
      - name: interestRate
      - name: term

      - name: estimate-tax

        arguments:
          parameters:

          - name: city
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.city }}}}'
      - name: calculate-mortgage
        template: calculate-mortgage
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: propertyPrice
            value: '{{{{ tasks.get-property-price.result }}}}'
          - name: downPayment
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.downPayment }}}}'
          - name: interestRate
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.interestRate }}}}'
          - name: term
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.term }}}}'
      - name: calculate-ownership-cost
        template: calculate-ownership-cost
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: mortgagePayment
            value: '{{{{ tasks.calculate-mortgage.result }}}}'
          - name: tax
            value: '{{{{ tasks.estimate-tax.result }}}}'
  - name: get-property-price
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: city

      - name: city

  - name: estimate-tax
    inputs:
      parameters:

      - name: city

      parameters:
      - name: propertyPrice
        value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.propertyPrice }}}}'

  - name: calculate-mortgage
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: propertyPrice
      - name: downPayment
      - name: interestRate
      - name: term
    http:

      parameters:
      - name: propertyPrice

      - name: downPayment
        value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.downPayment }}}}'
      - name: interestRate
        value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.interestRate }}}}'
      - name: term

  - name: calculate-ownership-cost

      parameters:

  generateName: schedule-meeting-
spec:
  entrypoint: schedule-meeting
  templates:
  - name: schedule-meeting
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: user_email
        value: 'alice@example.com'
      - name: start_time
        value: '14:00'
      - name: end_time
        value: '15:00'
      - name: timezone
        value: 'PST'
    dag:
      tasks:
      - name: schedule-meeting
        template: schedule-meeting-task

  - name: schedule-meeting-task
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: user_email
      - name: start_time
      - name: end_time
      - name: timezone
    container:
      image: python:3.8
      command: [python, -c]
      args: 
      - |
        import requests
        response = requests.post('http://example.com/schedule', json={
          'user_email': '{{{{ inputs.parameters.user_email }}}}',
          'start_time': '{{{{ inputs.parameters.start_time }}}}',
          'end_time': '{{{{ inputs.parameters.end_time }}}}',
          'timezone': '{{{{ inputs.parameters.timezone }}}}'
        })
        print(response.json())

        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: user_ID
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.user_ID }}}}'
          - name: movie_ID
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.movie_ID }}}}'
      - name: notify-user
        template: notify-user
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: watchlist_status
            value: '{{{{ tasks.add-to-watchlist.result }}}}'

  - name: add-to-watchlist
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: user_ID
      - name: movie_ID
    http:
      url: "http://example.com/api/addtowatchlist"
      method: POST
      headers:
        Content-Type: application/json
      body: |
        {
          "user_ID": "{{{{ inputs.parameters.user_ID }}}}",
          "movie_ID": "{{{{ inputs.parameters.movie_ID }}}}"
        }

  - name: notify-user
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: watchlist_status
    http:
      url: "http://example.com/api/notify"
      method: POST
      headers:
        Content-Type: application/json
      body: |
        {
          "message": "The movie has been added to your watchlist: {{{{ inputs.parameters.watchlist_status }}}}"
        }

apiVersion: argoproj.io/v1alpha1
kind: Workflow
metadata:
  generateName: movie-outing-
spec:
  entrypoint: movie-outing
  templates:
  - name: movie-outing
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: city
      - name: movie_name
      - name: date
      - name: travelTime
      - name: number_of_tickets
    dag:
      tasks:
      - name: get-cinema
        template: get-cinema
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: city
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.city }}}}'
          - name: movie
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.movie_name }}}}'
      - name: get-ticket-price
        template: get-ticket-price
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: cinema
            value: '{{{{ tasks.get-cinema.result }}}}'
          - name: movie
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.movie_name }}}}'
      - name: find-showtime
        template: find-showtime
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: movie_name
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.movie_name }}}}'
          - name: location
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.city }}}}'
          - name: date
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.date }}}}'
      - name: calculate-total-movie-outing-time
        template: calculate-total-movie-outing-time
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: travelTime
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.travelTime }}}}'
          - name: movieLength
            value: '{{{{ tasks.find-showtime.result }}}}'
      - name: book-movie-ticket
        template: book-movie-ticket
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: movie_name
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.movie_name }}}}'
          - name: showtime
            value: '{{{{ tasks.find-showtime.result }}}}'
          - name: number_of_tickets
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.number_of_tickets }}}}'
  - name: get-cinema
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: city
      - name: movie
    container:
      image: my-cinema-api-image
      command: ["sh", "-c"]
      args: ["curl -X GET 'http://cinema.api/get?city={{inputs.parameters.city}}&movie={{inputs.parameters.movie}}'"]
  - name: get-ticket-price
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: cinema
      - name: movie
    container:
      image: my-ticket-price-api-image
      command: ["sh", "-c"]
      args: ["curl -X GET 'http://ticketprice.api/get?cinema={{inputs.parameters.cinema}}&movie={{inputs.parameters.movie}}'"]
  - name: find-showtime
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: movie_name
      - name: location
      - name: date
    container:
      image: my-showtime-api-image
      command: ["sh", "-c"]
      args: ["curl -X GET 'http://showtime.api/find?movie_name={{inputs.parameters.movie_name}}&location={{inputs.parameters.location}}&date={{inputs.parameters.date}}'"]
  - name: calculate-total-movie-outing-time
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: travelTime
      - name: movieLength
    container:
      image: my-outing-time-api-image
      command: ["sh", "-c"]
      args: ["curl -X GET 'http://outingtime.api/calculate?travelTime={{inputs.parameters.travelTime}}&movieLength={{inputs.parameters.movieLength}}'"]
  - name: book-movie-ticket
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: movie_name
      - name: showtime
      - name: number_of_tickets
    container:
      image: my-booking-api-image
      command: ["sh", "-c"]
      args: ["curl -X POST 'http://booking.api/book' -d 'movie_name={{inputs.parameters.movie_name}}&showtime={{inputs.parameters.showtime}}&number_of_tickets={{inputs.parameters.number_of_tickets}}'"]

apiVersion: argoproj.io/v1alpha1

          - name: destination

apiVersion: argoproj.io/v1alpha1
kind: Workflow
metadata:
  generateName: reserve-favorite-food-
spec:
  entrypoint: main
  templates:
  - name: main
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: user_name
        value: 'Emma'
      - name: date
        value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.date }}}}'
      - name: time
        value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.time }}}}'
    dag:
      tasks:
      - name: get-favorite-food
        template: get-favorite-food
      - name: reserve-table
        dependencies: [get-favorite-food]
        template: reserve-table
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: restaurant_name
            value: '{{{{ tasks.get-favorite-food.result }}}}'
          - name: date
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.date }}}}'
          - name: time
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.time }}}}'
  - name: get-favorite-food
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: user_name
    container:
      image: python:3.8
      command: [python]
      args: ['-c', 'import requests; print(requests.get(f"http://api.example.com/GetUserFavoriteFood?user_name={{{{inputs.parameters.user_name}}}}"))']
  - name: reserve-table
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: restaurant_name
      - name: date
      - name: time
    container:
      image: python:3.8
      command: [python]
      args: ['-c', 'import requests; print(requests.post("http://api.example.com/BookRestaurant", json={"restaurant_name": "{{{{inputs.parameters.restaurant_name}}}}", "date": "{{{{inputs.parameters.date}}}}", "time": "{{{{inputs.parameters.time}}}}"}))']

apiVersion: argoproj.io/v1alpha1
kind: Workflow
metadata:
  generateName: play-recommended-song-
spec:
  entrypoint: main
  templates:
  - name: main
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: user_id
        value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.user_id }}}}'
    dag:
      tasks:
      - name: fetch-user-playlist
        template: fetch-user-playlist
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: user_id
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.user_id }}}}'
      - name: recommend-song
        template: recommend-song
        dependencies: [fetch-user-playlist]
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: user_mood
            value: 'happy'  # Assuming a default mood for recommendation
      - name: songname-to-id
        template: songname-to-id
        dependencies: [recommend-song]
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: song_name
            value: '{{{{ tasks.recommend-song.result }}}}'
      - name: play-song
        template: play-song
        dependencies: [songname-to-id]
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: user_ID
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.user_id }}}}'
          - name: song_ID
            value: '{{{{ tasks.songname-to-id.result }}}}'

  - name: fetch-user-playlist
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: user_id
    container:
      image: my-api-image
      command: ["sh", "-c"]
      args: ["curl -X POST -d '{\"user_id\": {{inputs.parameters.user_id}}}' http://api.example.com/fetchUserPlaylist"]

  - name: recommend-song
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: user_mood
    container:
      image: my-api-image
      command: ["sh", "-c"]
      args: ["curl -X POST -d '{\"user_mood\": \"{{inputs.parameters.user_mood}}\"}' http://api.example.com/recommendSong"]

  - name: songname-to-id
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: song_name
    container:
      image: my-api-image
      command: ["sh", "-c"]
      args: ["curl -X POST -d '{\"song_name\": \"{{inputs.parameters.song_name}}\"}' http://api.example.com/songname2ID"]

  - name: play-song
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: user_ID
      - name: song_ID
    container:
      image: my-api-image
      command: ["sh", "-c"]
      args: ["curl -X POST -d '{\"user_ID\": {{inputs.parameters.user_ID}}, \"song_ID\": {{inputs.parameters.song_ID}}}' http://api.example.com/playSong"]

apiVersion: argoproj.io/v1alpha1
kind: Workflow
metadata:
  generateName: play-song-workflow-
spec:
  entrypoint: play-song
  templates:
  - name: play-song
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: user_mood
      - name: user_ID
        value: 1  # Assuming 'mia' has user_ID 1
    dag:
      tasks:
      - name: recommend-song
        template: recommend-song
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: user_mood
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.user_mood }}}}'
      - name: song-title-to-id
        template: song-title-to-id
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: song_title
            value: '{{{{ tasks.recommend-song.outputs.result }}}}'
      - name: play-song
        template: play-song
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: user_ID
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.user_ID }}}}'
          - name: song_ID
            value: '{{{{ tasks.song-title-to-id.outputs.result }}}}'

  - name: recommend-song
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: user_mood
    http:
      url: http://example.com/recommendSong
      method: GET
      parameters:
      - name: user_mood
        value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.user_mood }}}}'

  - name: song-title-to-id
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: song_title
    http:
      url: http://example.com/songTitleToID
      method: GET
      parameters:
      - name: song_title
        value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.song_title }}}}'

  - name: play-song
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: user_ID
      - name: song_ID
    http:
      url: http://example.com/playSong
      method: GET
      parameters:
      - name: user_ID
        value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.user_ID }}}}'
      - name: song_ID
        value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.song_ID }}}}'
